name: Dayleavery
description:
Synopsys

Tired of your work and your abusive boss, your only help, your loving family. The story puts yourself in the shoes of a driver delivering parcel by night.

How to play

Interract with your environment and try to fight the fatigue by drinking coffee.

You earn money by delivering your packages then you can buy some coffee to keep awake until the inevitable...

Produced for

Ludum Dare 50 - Delay the inevitable

Credits

Yuyuiopyuyu: Music, SFX, Art

Nidel: Dev, Story

Made with

  • Unity & Visual Studio
  • CubeBase & Audacity
  • Aseprite & Photoshop
  • Love from Belgium <3
